results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-57487ff4b5-nfkt6 Pod/wordpress-57487ff4b5-28tq8 Pod/wordpress-57487ff4b5-fnv2l], expected 3

results.details:
Error: The service is missing ready endpoints; 3 pods are expected but not all are ready.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect logs using `kubectl logs [pod-name]`.
3. Verify pod readiness probes.
4. Ensure sufficient resources and no node issues.
5. Restart pods if needed.

results.name: default/wordpress-57487ff4b5-28tq8

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
